page.title: 15FASHION SHOP:THE BOX ROOM
page.content: On Tuesday 25th June we went to the Box Room.The Box Room is a little shop down Bond Street,it sells clothes, shoes but it does not sell wellies. The Box Room has been a clothes shop for 14 years this August.The dearest price is a jacket which is Â£16.95.The Box Room opens in the morning at 9.30am and shuts for lunch at 1.30pm and opens again at 2.30pm till 5.30pm. The Box Room get their clothes from a wholesaler in the east end of London.The lady we saw has worked there for about 8 months they have two staff working for them.They get about 30 customers a day.It has mostly the same customers who buy their chothes. The most popular colour is pastel.The Box Room sells jeans most of all.All the clothes in the Box Room are in fashion.Some people buy straight away while others have clothes put by.
